__e: Look Simon, I think you will admit that, whilst Rex and I have been your closest friends for more than ten years now, we have never at any time stressed our age or our greater experience. Now tonight, I'm going to break that rule.
But to get there you have to come out from where you are so that they'll let you come home to Rex and to me.
Rex and I always hoped the children would take an interest in working with those less fortunate, but...
George, Rex hasn't even been dead for two months.
- I want them to see us together.
